N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-8.4 - Cleaning and sanitizing frequency

State Regulations
(a) Tongs, ladles, other utensils and product
modules shall be cleaned and sanitized before being restocked with food
product. If contamination is observed or suspected, food-contact surfaces shall
be cleaned and sanitized immediately. (b) While the salad bar is in operation, the
floor area around it must be maintained in a clean condition using dustless
methods. The food display/dispensing unit and attached/associated equipment
must be maintained clean. Routine cleaning shall be conducted daily prior to
stocking the unit. Spot cleaning shall be conducted as necessary. Notes
